Went there last night based on recommendations and ratings from Yelp and were not dissapointed at all! It's all true - attentive and  friendly (young and beautifull too) staff and great ambience.  Food was excellent. We came for paella specifically, had burrato salad and "tirradito" salmon as apperizers, paired with nice bottle of wine (well thought out selection of those).  Hope the owners/management will be able to keep  all that quality up till our next visit to Barcelona, because we'll be coming back!
